      • kdRangeSearch

        private void kdRangeSearch(int left,
                           int right,
                           int axis,
                           O query,
                           ModifiableDoubleDBIDList res,
                           DBIDArrayIter iter,
                           double radius)
        Perform a kNN search on the kd-tree.
        Parameters:
        left - Subtree begin
        right - Subtree end (exclusive)
        axis - Current splitting axis
        query - Query object
        res - kNN heap
        iter - Iterator variable (reduces memory footprint!)
        radius - Query radius
